xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">retrieve-incident</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys /> <instance> <incident-i-d> <value> <xsl:value-of select="concat(//schedule-name/text(), "+++")" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </incident-i-d> <i-m-ticket-status> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Work in progress</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </i-m-ticket-status> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">create-incident</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys /> <instance> <incident-i-d> <value> <xsl:value-of select="concat(concat(//schedule-name/text(), "+++"), translate(translate(translate(//actual-start/text(), " ", ""), "/", ""), ":", ""))" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </incident-i-d> <category> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">telecoms</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </category> <severity> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </severity> <primary-assignment-group> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">CLIENT SECURITY</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </primary-assignment-group> <incident-description> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Array</xsl:text> </type> <incident-description> <element> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Scheduled event failed to be executed.</xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">LOG MESSAGE : </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="'${log message}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </incident-description> </incident-description> <contact> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">THOMPSON, TERESA</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </contact> <subcategory> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">fixed infrastructure</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </subcategory> <site-category> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Site Category</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </site-category> <product-type> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">fixed infrastructure</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </product-type> <problem-type> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">none</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </problem-type> <initial-impact> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">2</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </initial-impact> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">update-incident</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys> <incident-i-d> <value> <xsl:value-of select="'${incident id}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </incident-i-d> </keys> <instance> <incident-description> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Array</xsl:text> </type> <incident-description> <element> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Schedule again failed at: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="//scheduled-start/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">LOG MESSAGE: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="'${log message}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </incident-description> </incident-description> <journal-updates> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Array</xsl:text> </type> <journal-updates> <element> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Schedule again failed at: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="//scheduled-start/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">LOG MESSAGE: </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="'${log message}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </journal-updates> </journal-updates> <assignee-name> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">CLIENT SECURITY 1</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </assignee-name> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">close-incident</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys> <incident-i-d> <value> <xsl:value-of select="'${incident id}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </incident-i-d> </keys> <instance> <resolution> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Array</xsl:text> </type> <resolution> <element> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Scheduled event completed, hence resolving the ticket.</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </resolution> </resolution> <solution> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Array</xsl:text> </type> <solution> <element> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Scheduled event completed, hence resolving the ticket.</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </solution> </solution> <resolution-fix-type> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">permanent</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </resolution-fix-type> <closure-code> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </closure-code> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
